Electrical equipment and components and supplies (French)
full_summary:
### Multifunction Electrical Calibrator Tender Announcement
#### Tender Details

**Reference Number**: cb-977-85716686
**Publication Date**: January 8, 2024
**Tender Closing Date**: January 23, 2024 (2:00 PM ET)
**Expected Contract Start Date**: January 29, 2024
**Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024

#### Tender Overview
The Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) department is seeking a supplier to provide a multifunction electrical calibrator. The successful bidder will be required to deliver the calibrator on or before March 31, 2024.

#### Tender Requirements
The ECCC department requires a multifunction electrical calibrator, specifically the FLUKE 5730A or equivalent model. The tender includes the following details:

* Tender status: Expired
* Tender method: Competitive - Selective tendering
* Selection criteria: Lowest price
* Trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of opportunity: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Regions of delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

#### Contact Information

* Agency: Environment and Climate Change Canada
* Address: 351 Boul. Saint-Joseph, Gatineau, QC K1A 0H3, Canada
* Contact person: Anne-Marie Boucher
* Contact email: [anne-marie.boucher@ec.gc.ca](mailto:anne-marie.boucher@ec.gc.ca)
* Contact phone: (819) 307-7492

#### Attachment and Notice URL

* Attachment: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28878/notice-of-proposed-procurement.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28878/notice-of-proposed-procurement.pdf)
* Notice URL: Not available

#### Supply Arrangement Information

* The tender is issued as a requirement of the Supply Arrangement (SA) program.
* Only pre-qualified suppliers have been invited to bid.
* Suppliers that do not already hold a Supply Arrangement in series E60HN-16ELEC with Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) cannot submit a bid.
* Interested suppliers can contact PSPC at [steve.dumaresq@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:steve.dumaresq@pw
